item.title: Categorize Inernet Service Providers as Mobile Carriers or ISP - oDesk
item.description:
I've got a list of 1,000 internet service providers from around the world, and I need to know which ones are exclusively mobile carriers

Examples:
- "Comcast Cable" is not a mobile carrier, its an ISP that provides broadband cable internet
- "Service Provider Corporation" is a mobile carrier exclusively (AT&T behind the scenes)

Notes:
- Some of the names here are not the names the carriers market themselves as, a bit of digging will be required

Process:
- I'd suggest doing it by country, and first find the names of the big mobile carriers for that country, then figure out what they are called in this list
- I've already done this for the US, Canada and the UK, so most of their mobile carriers are excluded from this list
- The countries with the largest numbers are the most important (e.g. India)

Budget is not set in stone, please give a competitive bid

Budget: $25
Starting On: January 25, 2013
Ending On:
Posted On: January 25, 2013 16:44 UTC
ID: 202098085
Category: Administrative Support > Data Entry
Skills:
Country: Canada
Hours Billed: 699.83

item.title: iOS development for ongoing tasks - oDesk
item.description:
Hi dear all,

We are busy with providing complex iOS solutions to our clients; now sometimes we find that we'd like to share some of the workload to somebody else to handle.

The kind of tasks we're planning to share are pretty common things in iOS -  cocoa (building simple interfaces), in-app purchases. Knowledge of more complex things like iCloud is not required though could be useful.

Though you should know MVC so that your code could be easily integrated with. It's important that you have good communication skills, even better if you know Russian.

Please make sure to do a personalized bid for this application. Copy-paste bids will be rejected.

Thanks,
--N

item.title: Long term 30 hour plus North America based WordPress developer needed - oDesk
item.description:
We are looking for a long term contract with a WordPress developer who is highly skilled in:

1) CSS 3
2) HTML
3) PHP

Know well or go find out how to:
4) How to make a theme responsive / mobile ready
5) Know your way around photoshop so you can slice up graphics for custom designs or better yet you can create buttons and simple graphics.
6) advanced WordPress, how to create a page template or create an admin area.
7) know what a child theme is and why you use one instead of dev on a parent theme.
8) Be willing or already know woocommerce plugin and other e-commerce plugins for WordPress.
9) Be able to develop themes that can be used long term for multiple clients

Absolutely Required:
1) Must be based in North America.
2) Must communicate very well, including being able to talk to a client now and then
3) Must be available on Skype/e-mail/phone during normal hours by normal I mean we can talk to you between 8/9:00 AM pacific to 6:00 PM pacific Monday through Friday
4) Must care about your projects and actually want them to work out, you will go the distance and find a way to make things work. You want a solution but you are honest enough to say when it cant be done. Honest open communication.
5) You have a minimum of 30+ hours a week to dedicate to our team. Many weeks we go 30+ hours. We will guarantee 30 hours. We should be your main gig, Others need to take a backseat.
6) You do not need to take a month long vacation every other month. We appreciate vacations and know we must avoid burn out but we need advance notice when you will be gone. If you do go, hopefully you bring a laptop :)
7) Must be able to work on several projects at one time and small bug fixes as they pop up
8) We can skype you on a moments notice and we will have daily standups.

Our team has great people who are fun to work with, communicate effectively, care about quality yet can get things done quickly. Please be the same.

Starting On: January 25, 2013
Ending On:
Posted On: January 25, 2013 15:21 UTC
ID: 202097726
Category: Web Development > Web Programming
Skills: wordpress,css,html,php,graphics
Country: United States
Hours Billed: 3,591.50

item.title: Desktop integration - oDesk
item.description:
We are looking for a mobile application to work both IOS and Android.

We currently have a desktop application that has a database of people. We need a mobile app that can sync with the desktop application (bluetooth, wireless & wired).

The "App" needs to connect to a windows service on the users PC. The service will be provided by us. There will be two methods - one that returns a list of groups/teams and these will each have a list of members. The second will return a list of individual members. The members returned will all have mobile phone numbers attached. The app must be able to send an sms to the groups or individuals by the users own mobile plan.

The user would need to enter a security key to access this "App".

Hello,
I am writing on behalf of soleobsessed.com.  We are a wordpress based web blog/e-magazine and in need of a few alterations on our current site.  There are three aspects of our current site that we need assistance with:

1.  We would like to change our current photo slider within our post.  We are looking for a slider which shows the main feature image once you access the post's content and the ability to cycle through different photos from that point.  Below our a couple of links with examples of the type of slider we are looking for:

http://www.highsnobiety.com/2012/12/24/new-givenchy-springsummer-2013-collection-releases/
***once you click on a post, the main image gives you the option to click an arrow in order to cycle through the post's images***

2.  We would like to change the slider on our home page.  The slider on our home page shows feature content but we would like to change it to a more sleek design.  It also causes our page to load slow.  A couple of examples of what we are looking for:

http://www.smithoptics.com/
http://www.gametrailers.com/

3.  Lastly, we are having trouble with our e-commerce site. We use cashie commerce for our e-commerce which is also linked to our facebook page.  The store shows fine on pc but when accessed from a mobile device...it is distorted.  I've contacted cashiecommerce and they stated that there is most likely an issue As well, when accessing the store from a pc, the page shows as if its a post-with the author, date, author info and comment section visible and we would not like to have that visible if possible.

item.title: iPhone & Android App Design - oDesk
item.description:
Hi,

We are looking for competent app designers who is experienced with both custom iPhone & Android app design. We will be providing the wireframes and design direction for both iPhone & Android, and the candidate only needs to design the app in Photoshop (all custom elements), and have the elements sliced up in non-retina, retina, and -568h formats, and named appropriately. They should also provide a info sheet on keynote with the relevant color codes, font, and image names so our developer can work with your deliverables.

Deliverables:
Photoshop files in 480x320, 960x640 in high res per app page (iphone)
Photoshop files in 480x320 in high res per app page (android)
Sliced up images compatible for non-retina, @2x, and -568h
keynote file with references

For more info, please visit http://www.getappninja.com.

Applicants should have experience in the following before applying:
1) Photoshop
2) User interface/ experience
3) Slicing
4) GUI Guidelines for iPhone & Android App Design
5) Strong communication in English verbally and written
6) Able to respond promptly to messages (within a day)
7) Communicate via Skype / Basecamp (we will provide)

For all applicants applying, please include the following in your message:
1) Portfolio of mobile app design
2) Rates
3) Availability in Feb

***Please begin with 'APPNINJA' in your title in your reply as we do not entertain spam mails.

Shortlisted candidates will be looking at a steady stream of app design work for the span of the year. Hope to hear from you soon. Good luck.

item.title: Android graphical themable clock widget - oDesk
item.description:
I am looking for android developers for an android clock widget project.

It is highly graphical but otherwise relatively simple in functionality.

Native menus, checkboxes, etc.
No alarm.

Please show proof of prior widget, clock, or themable work.
Clock App General requirements:
Will need ability to buy additional theme packs (apps) later.

Designed for Jelly Bean/Android phones (may grow to iPhone, but not any time soon - Please suggest abstraction layer ideas and implementation options. )
Preferably (if possible) use any new graphics technology Jelly Bean and Butter have to make the app respond quickly.

Widget should be resizable. 2x2, 3x3, 4x4, 5x5, and so on. I expect 99% of our clocks will be square and all perfectly centered. No need to worry about rectangles. The widget resizing may
be something that Jelly Bean handles already. I don’t know.
The clock should appear reasonable even at higher resolutions (my phone is actually 1080p). 800x800px for the different clock images should suffice. If they have a tablet, then it will still  look good if they go larger. Advice on the image size? Please tell me.
I have no idea how the developer wants to handle the clock pieces. This is up for discussion, but my assumption is to have the backing, markers, numbers, and each of the 3 hands, all be
on individual images and then layered properly by the app. As long as we make our images right, everything will center nicely. Layering these pieces should also allow turning on and off
the different pieces. Even if the user wants to turn everything off and make the clock invisible, they can.
I’d like the app to protect its files and images. I do not want users to have the ability to add images/create or replace images/move or copy images/or accidentally break the app. All
images should be protected from tinkering however this is possible.
The app will have theme packs. Theme X, Theme Y, Theme Z, and so on, that they will be able to purchase online just like the app Each theme will have skins, different styles, or variations
that fit the theme. We’d like the themes to be located in the app, not the widget list. Shown in my presentation.
Users will be able to turn on and off the: face, numbers, markers, and second hand. We will provide each layer individually for each clock. All images from us will be PNG so we can use
the transparency.
We’d like to be able to streamline creating the theme packs. We need to discuss this process as soon as we need to. When we are done with a theme graphically, how long before it’s
available in the market and added to the main app. We can already assume our images will be perfect and ready to go.
No calendar, no alarms, no music, or sound effects. It’s just a clock widget for now and most phones have an alarm app built in.
I’d also like to say we have over 40 themes discussed and waiting to be created. We will have lots of little app fingers out there to grab attention and thus sales.  We’re starting out with
the neon theme so we can get familiar. We will have plenty of work just with these clocks for now. I have more app ideas ready to go once we’re sailing and have a system. Our graphics
will be absolutely top notch. I’m working with two other designers and we all bring some great talent to the table. This is not a clock widget that will be anything less than the highest
quality graphics and designs.

Ending On:
Posted On: January 25, 2013 08:52 UTC
ID: 202096718
Category: Software Development > Mobile Apps
Skills: graphics,android-app-development,android-sdk,android-development,english

item.title: 3D Modelling & Animation for Continental Car - oDesk
item.description:
Hi,

We would like to have an experienced 3D modeller, preferably with experience in Autodesk Maya to produce a 3D model (with full texture and slight animation) and have it compatible for export to Unity 3D in .fbx format.

The candidate ought to have a clear idea what are the limitations for export in .fbx format so that all textures are exported together with the 3D model into Unity 3D.

The model we are looking to build is a BMW 6-series (detailed) with interior of the car (no need for too much details), with slight animation of the doors opening and closing, and the car driving into the viewport, and the car driving out of viewport.

Here is an example of what we require for the 3D model/animation:

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lzqc8mdktbE

The augmented reality/mobile app portion will be taken care by us. All we need is the 3D model and animation.

Pls apply only if you have the relevant knowledge in the following:

1) Autodesk Maya 3D Modelling, Texture & Animation
2) Export from Maya to Unity 3D in .fbx format
3) Able to communicate well verbally & written in English
4) Able to reply to all messages and respond promptly (within a day)
5) Communicate via Skype/ Basecamp (we will provide)

For all who apply, please provide the following in your reply:
1) 3D work portfolio (priority given to those who have done car models before)
2) Your estimated rates for the job scope provided above
3) Your time frame needed for scope mentioned

***Please begin with 'CAR' in your title or we will not be entertaining spam mails. All candidates who have a strong portfolio can be looking at a steady stream of 3D projects over the next 1 year.

Hope to hear from you soon. Good luck.

item.title: UX/UI Redesign of an existing phonegap app - oDesk
item.description:
We are looking for an expert UX Designer to redesigned an existing app built with phonegap and designed for Android and iPhone.

- Redesigning should include war framing of the concepts to make this app more appealing to public. We have average 10 different screens
- Redesign app so it is able to work with latest android version.
- Designs need to be nice
- We don't want to redesign 100%, we need to keep the brand, color and other concepts that we already have there.
- Change things only if there'a a need to change.
- A review of the app should be added to the description.
- Deliver in two sets: actual design and Welcome

Further instructions shall be provided to the selected candidate.

Requirements:
1. This is urgent so someone who can complete this task ASAP will be considered.
2. Only someone who has done this before or skilled in UI/UX/ mobile ux design/interface prototyping
3. Can work during CST business time.
4. Can report promptly (no excuses)
5. Very good in English, both written and verbal

To APPLY:
In your cover letter, state the following:
- Brief summary of you experience in working in similar task and provide reference to it.
- Availability per day (how many hours can you spend in this task) and during what time in CST
- Estimated timeframe of finishing this project

Place this line above your cover letter: "I am an expert UX/UI designer"

Thank you and good luck!

Budget: $200
